#Load the libraries

```{r}

Audits_data_2013
```

```{r}
table2013 <- table(Audits_data_2013$'Auditor', Audits_data_2013$'Body type')
as.data.frame(table2013)
```

```{r}
formattable(table2013)
```
